oi.thekraken.grok.api

Class Grok

  • java.lang.Object
    • oi.thekraken.grok.api.Grok
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class Grok
extends Object
implements Serializable
    Grok parse arbitrary text and structure it.
    Grok is simple API that allows you to easily parse logs and other files (single line). With Grok, you can turn unstructured log and event data into structured data (JSON).
    example:
      Grok grok = Grok.create("patterns/patterns");
  grok.compile("%{USER}");
  Match gm = grok.match("root");
  gm.captures();
    Since:
    0.0.1
    Author:
    anthonycorbacho
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        public static Grok create(String grokPatternPath,
                          String grokExpression)
                   throws GrokException
        Create a Grok instance with the given patterns file and a Grok pattern.
        Parameters:
        grokPatternPath - Path to the pattern file
        grokExpression - - OPTIONAL - Grok pattern to compile ex: %{APACHELOG}
        Returns:
        Grok instance
        Throws:
        GrokException - runtime expt

      • compile

        public void compile(String pattern)
             throws GrokException
        Compile the Grok pattern to named regex pattern.
        Parameters:
        pattern - : Grok pattern (ex: %{IP})
        Throws:
        GrokException - runtime expt

      • compile

        public void compile(String pattern,
                    boolean namedOnly)
             throws GrokException
        Compile the Grok pattern to named regex pattern.
        Parameters:
        pattern - : Grok pattern (ex: %{IP})
        namedOnly - : Whether to capture named expressions only or not (i.e. %{IP:ip} but not ${IP})
        Throws:
        GrokException - runtime expt

      • discover

        public String discover(String input)
        Grok will try to find the best expression that will match your input. Discovery
        Parameters:
        input - : Single line of log
        Returns:
        the Grok pattern
